channel.title: ::ModHelp ::AdminHelp And ::Help Command
channel.description:
Hey Guys I've Search Everywhere But Haven't Find A ::Help / ::ModHelp And ::AdminHelp, So Do You Guys Now Whats The Command Is?
-NoTy

item.title: ::ModHelp ::AdminHelp And ::Help Command
item.dc:creator: @noty noty
item.description:
@noty wrote:

[quote=“Atreyu1993, post:4, topic:430369”]This should work, if you want to make separate commands just change the playerRights requirements.

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("help")) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; if(c2.playerRights == 1 && c2.playerRights == 2 || c2.playerRights == 3){ c2.sendMessage("The player : " +c.playerName+ " is requesting your assistance!"); } } } }

**Note this is assuming your using a project insanity source.[/quote]
thanks alote

Read full topic

item.title: ::ModHelp ::AdminHelp And ::Help Command
item.dc:creator: @Atreyu1993 Atreyu1993
item.description:
@Atreyu1993 wrote:

This should work, if you want to make separate commands just change the playerRights requirements.

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("help")) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; if(c2.playerRights == 1 && c2.playerRights == 2 || c2.playerRights == 3){ c2.sendMessage("The player : " +c.playerName+ " is requesting your assistance!"); } } } }

**Note this is assuming your using a project insanity source.
